columns.name: reserved_instance_id
columns.description: The ID of the Reserved instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the instance.

columns.name: instance_type
columns.description: The instance type on which the Reserved Instance can be used.

columns.name: instance_state
columns.description: The state of the Reserved Instance purchase.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The Availability Zone in which the Reserved Instance can be used.

columns.name: currency_code
columns.description: The currency of the Reserved Instance. It's specified using ISO 4217 standard currency codes. At this time, the only supported currency is USD.

columns.name: duration
columns.description: The duration of the Reserved Instance, in seconds.

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: The time when the Reserved Instance expires.

columns.name: fixed_price
columns.description: The purchase price of the Reserved Instance.

columns.name: offering_class
columns.description: The offering class of the Reserved Instance.

columns.name: product_description
columns.description: The Reserved Instance product platform description.

columns.name: scope
columns.description: The scope of the Reserved Instance.

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: The date and time the Reserved Instance started.

columns.name: usage_price
columns.description: The usage price of the Reserved Instance, per hour.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the reserved instance.
